trans-unit.source: Import images into FAL for tt_products.
These functions are only available for admins.
Start the import of the images into FAL!
The import of the images into FAL has been finished!
You must make a backup copy of your images in the folder uploads/pics manually before you continue! All image files from this folder will be removed.
%s records of tt_products with images have been converted into FAL.
